task.prompt: Two teams are playing in a stadium with a capacity of 2000 people. The total number of people in the stadium is 3/4 of the total capacity and each person paid $20 in entry fees. What is the difference between the total amount of fees collected when the stadium was 3/4 full and if the stadium would have been full?
